docs.snippet: The Canadian lollar displayed a strong undertone last week, resulting in a recovery of all of the loss sustained in the preceding week. Buying was mainly for the account of those preparing to meet mo.nthend commitments which lifted remittance on the...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Canadian lollar displayed a strong undertone last week, resulting in a recovery of all of the loss sustained in the preceding week. Buying was mainly for the account of those preparing to meet mo.nthend commitments which lifted remittance on the Dominion to 88.06 cents, on Thursday, a gain of a full cent over anearly-week low. The close at 87.87 cents' reflected a net gain of 7 cent over the preceding week.

docs.lead_paragraph: Although Argentina has not broken off diplomatic relations with the Axis powers, her artists won five prizes, more than went to any other Latin-American nation, in the competition held by the Museum of Modern Art for posters to help unite the Western Hemisphere against Axis aggression.

docs.snippet: SANTIAGO, Chile, Oct. 22 (AP) -- President Juan Antonio Rios and his new Cabinet, set up to fulfill Chile's long-deferred hemispheric obligations, cracked down summarily today on both Axis spies and obstructive internal politics.
docs.lead_paragraph: SANTIAGO, Chile, Oct. 22 (AP) -- President Juan Antonio Rios and his new Cabinet, set up to fulfill Chile's long-deferred hemispheric obligations, cracked down summarily today on both Axis spies and obstructive internal politics.

headline.main: RIOS CRACKS DOWN TO PUT CHILE IN LINE; Drops New Foreign Minister Who Delays Acceptance to Consult His Party 3 REARRESTED AS SPIES Interior Minister Orders Axis Agents Seized After Their Release on a Technicality
